review: Though I had to wait for 2 hours but she was very patient and explained things very well. She listens to you and explain things after testing everything.

tags: None
review:
Taken my 90 year old dad after he had chest pain she was very patient in explaining us in detail the course of treatment 
She is very Prompt in responding to any queries which gives us a comfort level 
Very prompt in her appointment timings

tags: None
review: It was excellent. We were able to see the doctor before time. She was very helpful. We like to meet her again.Thank you.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Value for money,
review: **** ************ ****** *** very patient also with everyone. even though she is a serious doctor, and mine wasn't a serious ailment, she was patient enough to explain to me that i am worrying unnecessarily, it is not any heart problem but gastritis.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,
review: I visited the doctor for irregular heart beat issue. she was very rude and unprofessional. she also was not ready to listen to my problem and gave no heck about it.  not recommendeded

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Wait time,
review: **** ************* ****** *** very quick at diagnosis... Very encouraging doctor. Really helped a lot.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: Way she explained and treated.also friendliness also health tips given by her wa extremely good and helpfhelpful

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: Doctor is very friendly and understands the problem from the root. She explains each and everything in detail , she doesn't prescribe you medicines untill it is very critical. I am very happy with the doctor . Before this , I went to other doctor in HSR , he was not at all so active in treating you ,he asked for further test and started giving medicines. ** * *** *** ******** ** **** **** ****** *** it's such a relief after consulting with her .

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,
review: She very well explains all health issues, causes and medication. Overall experience is satisfactory.
